00012 VelocityControlServer::VelocityControlServer(std::string action_name,std::string ctrl_velocity_topic):
00013 as(n, action_name, boost::bind(&VelocityControlServer::executeCB, this, _1), false),
00014 action_name(action_name){
00015         ROS_INFO("Starting Up Velocity Command Server on <%s>", this->action_name.c_str());
00016         this->as.start();
00017         //Advertise publishing to the controller's topics
00018         this->vel_pub = this->n.advertise<oryx_drive_controller::VelocityArc>(ctrl_velocity_topic, 2);
00019 }

00022         ROS_INFO("Shutting Down Server...");

00029 void VelocityControlServer::executeCB(const oryx_drive_controller::VelocityCommandGoalConstPtr& goal){
00030         ROS_INFO("Got Goal <R=%f, V=%f> on <%s>", goal->radius,goal->velocity, this->action_name.c_str());
00031         bool success;
00032         // check that preempt has not been requested by the client
00033         if (as.isPreemptRequested() || !ros::ok())
00034         {
00035                 ROS_INFO("%s: Preempted", action_name.c_str());
00036                 // set the action state to preempted
00037                 as.setPreempted();
00038                 success = false;
00039         }
00040         else{
00041                 //Create a new message to send to the controller
00042                 oryx_drive_controller::VelocityArcPtr msg(new oryx_drive_controller::VelocityArc);
00043 
00044                 //Build the message
00045                 msg->radius = goal->radius;
00046                 msg->velocity = goal->velocity;
00047 
00048                 //Publish the message
00049                 this->vel_pub.publish(msg);
00050 
00051                 this->result.capable = true;
00052                 this->result.success = true;
00053                 success = true;
00054         }
00055         //set success
00056         if(success){
00057                 this->as.setSucceeded(this->result, "I successfully set the new Velocity Arc goal");
00058         }
00059 }
